website_summaries.verdict: It may lack many of the bonus features seen in competing models, but this inexpensive fridge holds plenty of storage, dispenses delicious water, and looks just as sleek.
pros: Easy to rearrange shelves and compartments
cons: Its stainless steel exterior is not resistant to fingerprints

customer_reviews.title: On line shopping sucks
customer_reviews.text: Don’t like nothing about it it doesn’t work since the day I got it and still waiting for help
customer_reviews.author: Dionisio pena

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful fridge
customer_reviews.text: This was an excellent transaction and the we appreciate the excellent and kind service . It was easy to hook up , it came with clear instructions with no issues and we are enjoying it very much . Thank you - A++++++ from our family .
customer_reviews.author: A E

customer_reviews.title: My refrigerator is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new refrigerator! It,s perfect. Every shelf is adjustable and I love the room for condiments! Easy to clean, and lots of room! No smudges either!
customer_reviews.author: Audrey A Manuel

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Love the color. Barely see finger prints. Quiet 95% of the time. The ice maker makes s lil noise but nothing to make a deal over. Inside the fridge is right in the money. We appreciate our fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Best fridge ever
customer_reviews.text: I freaking love 💘 this fridge soo much room i can find everything my last fridge had the freezer on top i hated always having to squat down to find things in my fridge. Now everything is right there. This was my xmas gift and it was the best. Just saying :)
customer_reviews.author: Connie Torres

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Room
customer_reviews.text: This refrigerator has a lot of room, the icemaker is fantastic, produces and stores a huge quantity of ice
customer_reviews.author: Ernie Randall

customer_reviews.title: Works for the money
customer_reviews.text: The only thing is it's a little smaller inside than expected based on the cubic inch footprint advertised, but it works well. Also, the lights on the water and ice dispensers are not necessarily easy to pinpoint, especially for the elderly. Other than that, it's a good refrigerator.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: Couple of scratches, filtered water works sometimes and not others. Makes loud noises.
customer_reviews.author: kathryn tworek

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent fridge for the money
customer_reviews.text: Does what it should. Some minor irks and quirks like no LED bulb, but we took care of it and replaced it. Good value for money! FRESH ICE right into the cup!
customer_reviews.author: Communications

customer_reviews.title: That it functions correctly at least for one year
customer_reviews.text: It sucks, the second week with this refrigerator the ice maker stopped making ice, never again very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Anaya

customer_reviews.title: Price, Quality, Service you can't beat Amazon
customer_reviews.text: The quality was great and the inside was very spacious. Buying from Amazon, we can always expect quality and service. We got both! Way to go Amazon. PS The price was Amazing! And there payment plan was very convenient. Floyd Jones
customer_reviews.author: Floyd Jones

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it. It took a while for delivery but was well worth the wait.
customer_reviews.author: Mike and Angie😁

customer_reviews.title: Value for your money
customer_reviews.text: Ice maker is fast. You get value for your money
customer_reviews.author: Karen Gardiner

customer_reviews.title: Great look
customer_reviews.text: It took forever to get here, but it was definitely worth the wait. Looks great
customer_reviews.author: demarkeus

customer_reviews.title: Frigidaire
customer_reviews.text: still too new to see if we dislike as far as appearance the unit is great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad Water Filters. Do not buy Frigidaire.
customer_reviews.text: Frigidaire refrigerators have terrible water filters. After a month the water barely comes out. Plan on spending close to $400 per year to replace them, or just buy another brand. We have been very unhappy with our Frigidaire refrigerator and with their customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Avid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I like the size of the unit overall. It fits nicely in the standard space allotted for refrigerators in cabinetry. There are only two in the family so the space inside, although very adequate, is not as much a factor as it would be for a larger family. The downside for us is that the water and ice compartment (the outside dispenser)is not tall enough. That makes it a constant cleanup after dispensing ice because you can’t get a glass squarely under the lever.
customer_reviews.author: Patti Skinner

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I had the refrigerator for three weeks. The ice machine quit working a day before thanksgiving. It took me 4 day and a collective 5 hours to set up a Warrenty repair. It’s still not fixed. I would never by a Frigidaire again.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Forget about the Frigidaire warranty....
customer_reviews.text: Be very careful when considering this one: Doors come detached and are supposed to be installed by the delivery guys. Mine appeared fine in the first few days, but then BOTH doors began to make this clinking clanking noise each time i open and close them. Now it's been about 5 or 6 weeks since delivery, and when i contacted Frigidaire, this is what Frigidaire told me:"Installation is covered by the delivery company, who has the 48 hour policy where the company could have returned to correct any issues with the installation. Aside from that,our technicians only perform appliance repairs." So I am screwed.
customer_reviews.author: B.E.

customer_reviews.title: I like mine. It serves my purpose
customer_reviews.text: So far I like this refrigerator. I’m not into using the water dispenser because I drink bottled water. But felt that if I sell my house the new owners would. As to space, I have adjusted in creatively storing pizzas and other foods since I’m a vegetarian.. No complaints so far All the reviews I’ve read on all the water dispensers have been bad on all the models. But since I don’t use it, not a problem.
customer_reviews.author: penny

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy Frigidaire!!
customer_reviews.text: Average family, had this Frigidaire refrigerator for about a year. Three of the shelves have broken. Fragile plastic, really low quality and poor design.
customer_reviews.author: Five of Us

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for us
customer_reviews.text: We've had ours for 2 years now. No problems whatsoever. It was a very nice upgrade from our previous one at a very reasonable price. It's very spacious and I love the 3 options for the ice maker. The only thing that I wish it had was an indicator light for when the you need to replace the water filter. We just switch ours out every 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Tea

customer_reviews.title: If  you like problems pick this one
customer_reviews.text: Ice maker freezes and drips down to floor the back rusted out pre maturely, the freezer shelved are of poor construction, , plus many more irritating features
customer_reviews.author: John Z

customer_reviews.title: Unacceptably noisy
customer_reviews.text: Noisy. Several months after purhcase it just seems noisy as hell. I loathe that I am stuck with this very expensive purchase for years, maybe a decade, and that whole time it will be making my kitchen and living room intolerably noisy. Lame. Demoralizing.
customer_reviews.author: Fretless

product_meta.title: Frigidaire FFSS2615TS 36 Inch Side by Side Refrigerator with 25.5 cu. ft. Capacity, External Water Dispenser, Ice Maker, in Stainless Steel
product_meta.description: Color:Stainless Steel36 Inch Wide 25.5 Cu. Ft. Side By Side Refrigerator
feature_bullets: This refurbished product is tested and certified to look and work like new. The refurbishing process includes functionality testing, basic cleaning, inspection, and repackaging. The product ships with all relevant accessories, and may arrive in a generic box
